Stage 1 Objective: Have a command token in each of 5 systems that contain your ships.
Stage 2 Objective: Have a command token in each of 8 systems that contain your ships.

Stage 1 Objective: Own 3 technologies with at least 2 prerequisites.
Stage 2 Objective: Own 5 technologies with at least 2 prerequisites.

Stage 1 Objective: Spend 3 influence, 3 resources, and 3 trade goods.
Stage 2 Objective: Spend 6 influence, 6 resources, and 6 trade goods.

Stage 1 Objective: Have 4 ships with a cost of at least 2 in each of 2 systems.
Stage 2 Objective: Have 4 ships with a cost of at least 2 in each of 4 systems.

Stage 1 Objective: Have 4 or more structures.
Stage 2 Objective: Have 7 or more structures.

Stage 1 Objective: Own 2 technologies of a color and have a structure on a technology specialty planet of that color in a system not adjacent to your home system.
Stage 2 Objective: Own 2 technologies of 2 colors and have a structure on technology specialty planets of those colors in system(s) not adjacent to your home system.

Stage 1 Objective: Have 3 non-fighter ships in each of 3 systems.
Stage 2 Objective: Have 3 non-fighter ships in each of 5 systems.

Stage 1 Objective: Control planets with more combined influence than each of 2 players that are your neighbors.
Stage 2 Objective: Control planets in or adjacent to other players' home systems with a combine influence value of at least 5.

Stage 1 Objective: Control 2 planets outside your home system that are not adjacent to each other.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 4 planets outside your home system that are not adjacent to each other.

Stage 1 Objective: Have 10 units in each of 2 systems.
Stage 2 Objective: Have at least 15 units in each of 3 systems.

Stage 1 Objective: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait.

Stage 1 Objective: Exhaust 3 planets you control outside of your home system.
Stage 2 Objective: Exhaust 5 planets you control outside of your home system.

Stage 1 Objective: Have a structure on each of 2 planets you control with different technology specialties.
Stage 2 Objective: Have a structure on each of 3 planets you control with different technology specialties.

Stage 1 Objective: Have at least 1 ship with a cost of 4 or more in each of 3 systems.
Stage 2 Objective: Have at least 1 shps with a cost of 4 or more in each of 5 systems.

Stage 1 Objective: Have ground forces with a combined cost of at least 3 resources on each of 4 planets; infantry count as half a resource.
Stage 2 Objective: Have ground forces with a combined cost of at least 3 resources on each of 7 planets; infantry count as half a resource.

Stage 1 Objective: Own 2 unit upgrade technologies and have at least 2 of each of those units on the game board.
Stage 2 Objective: Own 3 unit upgrade technologies and have at least 2 of each of those units on the game board.

Stage 1 Objective: Control 2 planets that have attachments.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 3 planets that have attachments.

Stage 1 Objective: Have a structure on a planet of each of 3 different traits.
Stage 2 Objective: Have 2 structures on planets of each of 3 different traits.

Stage 1 Objective: Have 2 of each of 5 different units on the game board.
Stage 2 Objective: Have 4 of each of 6 different units on the game board.

Stage 1 Objective: Own 1 technology of each color, not including technologies you owned at the start of the game.
Stage 2 Objective: Own 2 technologies of each color, not including technologies you owned at the start of the game.

Stage 1 Objective: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors and control at least 1 technology specialty of each of those colors.
Stage 2 Objective: Own 4 technologies in each of 2 colors and control at least 1 technology specialty of each of those colors.

Stage 1 Objective: Control 3 planets adjacent to a system containing a planet controlled by another player.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 5 planets adjacent to a system containing a planet controlled by another player.

Stage 1 Objective: Have your flagship or war sun in a system that is not in or adjacent to your home system, ignoring wormhole adjacency.
Stage 2 Objective: Have your flagship or war sun in another player's home system or the Mecatol Rex system.

Stage 1 Objective: Spend 8 resources.
Stage 2 Objective: Spend 16 resources.

Stage 1 Objective: Control 6 planets in non-home systems.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 10 planets in non-home systems.

Stage 1 Objective: Own technologies with a combined 5 prerequisites
Stage 2 Objective: Own technologies with a combined 10 prerequisites.

Stage 1 Objective: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.
Stage 2 Objective: Have units in 5 systems that do not contain planets.

Stage 1 Objective: Control a planet of each trait, a planet with an attachment, and 2 planets with different technology specialties.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 2 planets of each trait, 2 planets with an attachment, and 3 planets with different a technology specialties.

Stage 1 Objective: Control 3 planets with at least 4 combined influence and resources.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 4 planets with at least 5 combined influence and resources.

Stage 1 Objective: Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system.
Stage 2 Objective: Have structures on 5 planets outside of your home system.

Stage 1 Objective: Control 3 planets with at least 3 influence.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 5 planets with at least 3 influence.

Stage 1 Objective: Have 2 structures on the game board that are not in or adjacent to your home system.
Stage 2 Objective: Have 3 structures on the game board that are not in or adjacent to your home system.

Stage 1 Objective: Have a structure on 2 different planets of the same trait.
Stage 2 Objective: Have a structure on 4 different planets of the same trait.

Stage 1 Objective: Have units in each of 3 systems that are not in or adjacent to your home system.
Stage 2 Objective: Have units in each of 5 systems that are not in or adjacent your home system.

Stage 1 Objective: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 1 planet that is in another player's home system.

Stage 1 Objective: Have at least 8 units in or adjacent to other players home systems.
Stage 2 Objective: Have at least 15 units in or adjacent to other players' home systems.

Stage 1 Objective: Exhaust 1 planet in each of 3 different systems.
Stage 2 Objective: Exhaust 1 planet in each of 5 different systems.

Stage 1 Objective: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.
Stage 2 Objective: Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.

Stage 1 Objective: Control 3 planets of a trait and 2 planets of another trait.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 4 planets of each of 2 different traits.

Stage 1 Objective: Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.
Stage 2 Objective: Have units in 4 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.

Stage 1 Objective: Have more units in or adjacent to the Mecatol Rex system than each of 2 players that are your neighbor.
Stage 2 Objective: Have 25 units in or adjacent to the Mecatol Rex system.

Stage 1 Objective: Have 3 non-fighter, non-infantry units of the same type in each of 4 systems.
Stage 2 Objective: Have 3 non-fighter, non-infantry units of the same type in each of 6 systems.

Stage 1 Objective: Spend 5 trade goods.
Stage 2 Objective: Spend 10 trade goods.

Stage 1 Objective: Have units in each of 5 systems that are in or adjacent to other players' units or planets.
Stage 2 Objective: Have units in each of 9 systems that are in or adjacent to other players' units or planets.

Stage 1 Objective: Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.
Stage 2 Objective: Have units in 5 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.

Stage 1 Objective: Exhaust 3 planets that contain your structures.
Stage 2 Objective: Exhaust 5 planets that contain your structures.

Stage 1 Objective: Control more planets than each of 2 of your neighbors.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 2 planets that are each in or adjacent to a different, other player's home system.

Stage 1 Objective: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.
Stage 2 Objective: Have 8 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

Stage 1 Objective: Have 15 non-infantry, non-fighter units on the game board.
Stage 2 Objective: Have 25 non-infantry, non-fighter units on the game board.

Stage 1 Objective: Control 3 planets with at least 3 resources.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 5 planets with at least 3 resources.

Stage 1 Objective: Control planets with more combined resources than each of 2 players that are your neighbors.
Stage 2 Objective: Control planets in or adjacent to other players home systems with a combine resource value of at least 5.

Stage 1 Objective: Have none of a unit type in your reinforcements while owning that unit's unit upgrade technology.
Stage 2 Objective: Have none of each of 2 unit types in your reinforcements while owning those unit's unit upgrade technologies.

Stage 1 Objective: Control a technology specialty planet matching each prerequisite for a unit upgrade technology you own.
Stage 2 Objective: Control a technology specialty planet matching each prerequisite for 2 unit upgrade technologies you own.

Stage 1 Objective: Have a mech, flagship, or upgraded faction specific unit in each of 3 systems adjacent to other players units or planets.
Stage 2 Objective: Have a mech, flagship, or upgraded faction specific unit in each of 5 systems adjacent to other players units or planets.

Stage 1 Objective: Control at least 1 planet in each of 4 systems.
Stage 2 Objective: Control at least 1 planet in each of 7 systems.

Stage 1 Objective: Have a ship with a cost of at least 3 in each of 4 systems.
Stage 2 Objective: Have a ship with a cost of at least 3 in each of 7 systems.

Stage 1 Objective: Spend 10 influence, resources, or a mix thereof.
Stage 2 Objective: Spend 20 influence, resources, or a mix thereof.

Stage 1 Objective: Exhaust 2 planets outside your home system each with at least a combined 4 influence and resources.
Stage 2 Objective: Exhaust 3 planets outside your home system each with at least a combined 4 influence and resources.

Stage 1 Objective: Have a ship in each of 4 systems that contain or are adjacent to another player's home system, Mecatol Rex, or a legendary planet.
Stage 2 Objective: Have a ship in each of 7 systems that contain or are adjacent to another player's home system, Mecatol Rex, or a legendary planet.

Stage 1 Objective: Control 4 planets that are legendary, Mecatol Rex, in other players home systems, or adjacent to any of the aforementioned planet types.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 7 planets that are legendary, Mecatol Rex, in other players home systems, or adjacent to any of the aforementioned planet types.

Stage 1 Objective: Have a ship in each of 4 systems that contain or are adjacent to a wormhole or gravity rift.
Stage 2 Objective: Have a ship in each of 7 systems that contain or are adjacent to a wormhole or gravity rift.

Stage 1 Objective: Spend 8 influence.
Stage 2 Objective: Spend 16 influence.

Stage 1 Objective: Own 2 technologies of a color, a technology specialty planet of that color, and a unit upgrade with a prerequisite of that color.
Stage 2 Objective: Own 4 technologies of a color, 2 technology specialty planets of that color, and a unit upgrade with a prerequisite of that color.

Stage 1 Objective: Control 2 planets with the same trait that are not in or adjacent to your home system.
Stage 2 Objective: Control 4 planets with the same trait that are not in or adjacent to your home system.

Stage 1 Objective: Have none of 3 different unit types in your reinforcements.
Stage 2 Objective: Have none of 5 different unit types in your reinforcements.
